body: This PR updates the OpenCL header packages `opencl-c-headers` and `opencl-clhpp`. The bundled package `opencl-headers` now supports completely OpenCL 3.0. Also it updates `ocl-icd` which now can provide together with the `opencl-headers` OpenCL 3.0
title: New versions of opencl-c-headers, opencl-clhpp and ocl-icd
